title: Womens Dress
title_original: Womens Fair Isle Sweaters Fall Winter Trendy Vintage Sweater Seniors Crewneck Knit Wool Pullover Tops 2025

specs.Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here
specs.Best Sellers Rank: #99,378 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry ( See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry ) #1,724 in Women's Pullover Sweaters

category: Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry > Women > Clothing > Sweaters > Pullovers

reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater beautiful and well-made, with a vibrant green color and perfect fit. They describe it as super soft, warm, and festive, with one customer noting it feels like a more expensive piece. Customers disagree on the comfort level, with some finding it itchy.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great brown sweater.
items.body: This is a fantastic sweater. I got the coffee color. It feels great and looks much more expensive than it was. It does run big. Even after sizing down it was a little loose. It has a bit of a stretch to it. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome, festive sweater
items.body: Beautiful sweater, lots of compliments. So happy with this purchase....true to size. Read more
items.author: Capt George C Crunch

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Warm , well made, fun to wear but a bit itchy
items.body: This is a well made warm winter sweater. It is beautiful and very unique .It is a bit itchy and a bit heavy but I can live with it because I really like the sweater. It is now one of my favorites ! Read more
items.author: Lisa Frankel

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Make more colors please!
items.body: I love this sweater. Can you make it in Maroon so I can buy another? Soft, comfortable, great color. Read more
items.author: Leslie Connito

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this sweater!!!!
items.body: This sweater is so beautiful and high-quality and a really nice cut of pattern Read more
items.author: Ra Ra

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Festive , warm wool blend sweater
items.body: This is a wonderful sweater. Soft, Wool blend makes it look and feel like a much more expensive sweater.The fit was true to size and the green /pattern trees so festive. Read more
items.author: Marilyn Kubalak

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful and warm
items.body: This sweater is beautiful and the colors are true to the photos. It is a very heavy sweater and would be more suitable to cooler, wintery places. I think the design should go all the way around the sweater. The fit isn’t as boxy as I expected, but it’s well made and looks great! Read more
items.author: Jennie Pielstick

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Warm!
items.body: Design is super cute Much heavier than appears Don’t get nervous when Amazon send a massage stating “ugly sweater has shipped” this is a classic Read more
items.author: Mimi2022

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Z Coffee, Z Reindeer, Sheep Gray, Ghost, Rainbow, Tree Green, Mushroom Red, Sheep Green, Z Apricot. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
